title: Pacino is always great
review: Anyone that likes Pacino must see this one, and you can't watch it just once.  You will pick up on much more the second time.  I don't think there is another actor that could have played the part any better.

title: Couldn't miss a minute!
review: This is one of the better movies I have seen in a long time.  The movie holds your attention the entire time.  It also shows that good guys don't have to finish last.  The only problem I see is that the language could have been cleaned up.  I don't understand why that can't be left out of great movies so everyone can enjoy them.

title: Better than I expected
review: I'm not a big sci-fi fan, so I didn't expect this to be a very good movie. Overall, it was pretty funny.  Without Tommy Lee Jones it probably wouldn't have been as good.
